title: LOL Alpha Client
body:
I was accepted to the LOL Alpha client but it wont let me create an account. I was told in game that I was accepted and through my email.
I got a picture of the email https://gyazo.com/769c8f73ed9250ea088e64d9f15e37a6

replies.body:
You do not have to create a new account for the Alpha Client. I believe you may have the Alpha Client confused with the PBE, which is a *different system entirely*.  The Alpha Client is for the live server you use (NA) and allows you to log in with your regular account and test the new client that will eventually replace the current one. The PBE is a test environment where you create a new account and try out balance changes or new champs before they're released on the live servers.

Let me know if you have any questions.
